mapper.select: SELECT s.KAISYA_CD AS KAISYACD, s.SHR_SYORI_NO AS SHRSYORINO, s.MAIN_TORI_CD AS MAINTORICD, s.KAK_TORI_KMK AS KAKTORIKMK, s.SHR_DATE AS SHRDATE, s.SIME_DATE AS SIMEDATE, s.FRI_END_DATE AS FRIENDDATE, s.SHR_KIN AS SHRKIN FROM K003RSHR s, K008TRHK t WHERE s.KAK_TORI_KMK = t.KAK_TORI_KMK AND t.KMK_CD = '4120' AND s.KAISYA_CD = #{kaisyaCd} AND s.JOTAI_KBN = #{jotaiKbn} AND s.FRI_END_DATE >= #{friEndDate01} AND s.FRI_END_DATE <= #{friEndDate02} ORDER BY s.FRI_END_DATE, s.MAIN_TORI_CD, s.SIME_DATE
